#Mailcheap

[Mailcheap.co](https://www.mailcheap.co/) is an enterprise email hosting solution. Get the flexibility and freedom of having your own email server and the affordable scalability and management offered by Mailcheap.

#Features:

- **Unlimited Domains**
- **Unlimited Users**
- **25 to 4000 GB Storage**
- Shared/Private/Dedicated email servers
- TLS for secure access & transmission
- SPF, DKIM, DMARC support (mail-tester scores 10/10)
- HA cloud servers w/ 99.99% uptime.
- Free setup & migration
- Webmail w/ 50 MB attachments
- IMAP, SMTP, POP3 support
- Web based admin panel
- Anti-spam & anti-virus protection w/ quarantine management
- DDoS protection
- Triple data replication (incl. offsite backups)
- Custom branding (private-label site)
- Direct-Admin™ support

#Offer

Use promo code **LET20** for 20% off on annual billing. Offer price: $48/yr.
